name: Longsword
short_description: Versatile straight blade good at balanced offense and defense; struggles against heavy armor without magical aid.

name: Shortsword
short_description: Light one-handed thrusting blade excels at finesse and stealth work; shorter reach limits effectiveness versus polearms.

name: Greatsword
short_description: Two-handed blade cleaves through multiple foes with high damage; heavy weight makes it slow and tiring.

name: Claymore
short_description: Scottish greatsword with long reach and wide guard ideal for sweeping strikes; poor in cramped quarters.

name: Zweihander
short_description: Massive Germanic sword that breaks pikes and halberds; unwieldy for anyone without great strength.

name: Scimitar
short_description: Curved single-edge sword excels at slashing from horseback; has trouble penetrating plate armor.

name: Falchion
short_description: Heavy cutting sword delivers axe-like blows against unarmored targets; slow recovery after each swing.

name: Rapier
short_description: Slim thrusting blade superb for duels and piercing gaps; minimal cutting power against thick hides.

name: Katana
short_description: Japanese curved sword famed for sharp draw-cuts and speed; brittle edge can chip on hard armor.

name: Wakizashi
short_description: Companion short katana useful in tight spaces and as backup; limited reach in stand-up fights.

name: Nodachi
short_description: Oversized katana styled for anti-cavalry sweeps; too long for indoor use.

name: Cutlass
short_description: Short naval sabre excels in close ship combat and can hack rigging; light guard offers little hand protection.

name: Sabre
short_description: Cavalry curved blade great for hit-and-run slashes; tip lacks thrusting power versus mail.

name: Broadsword
short_description: Wide medieval sword balances cut and thrust; mediocre at both compared to specialized blades.

name: Dagger
short_description: Compact blade ideal for concealment and backstabs; negligible reach limits open combat use.

name: Dirk
short_description: Long dagger suited for parrying and sudden lunges; lacks mass for heavy blows.

name: Stiletto
short_description: Triangular spike built to punch through gaps in armor; almost useless for slashing.

name: Kukri
short_description: Forward-curved Nepalese knife chops like a hatchet; awkward for fencing.

name: Tanto
short_description: Japanese short knife excels at armor piercing thrusts; very short range in melee.

name: Kris
short_description: Wavy Indonesian dagger causes horrific wounds and spiritual dread; undulates make straight thrusts harder to aim.

name: Katar
short_description: Punch dagger that delivers powerful straight stabs through mail; grip limits reach and flexibility.

name: Push Dagger
short_description: Palm-held spike ideal for grappling or underhand strikes; offers no guard for fingers.

name: Handaxe
short_description: Light axe doubles as throwing weapon and camp tool; short haft reduces leverage on armored foes.

name: Battleaxe
short_description: One-handed axe bites deep into shields; slower recovery than swords.

name: Greataxe
short_description: Two-handed axe delivers devastating single swings able to cleave armor; leaves wielder open if swing misses.

name: Bearded Axe
short_description: Extended lower blade hooks shields and limbs; beard weakens edge against thick plate.

name: Dane Axe
short_description: Long-haft Viking axe for reach over shield walls; requires space and training to control.

name: Bardiche
short_description: Pole-axe with crescent blade great for chopping cavalry legs; heavy head makes it tiring.

name: War Pick
short_description: Pick hammer concentrates force to punch plate; narrow point can glance off moving targets.

name: Halberd
short_description: Polearm with axe, spike, and hook offers versatile reach; ineffective in tight corridors.

name: Poleaxe
short_description: Knight-killer combining hammer, spike and beak to shatter armor; weight slows repeated strikes.

name: Glaive
short_description: Single-edge pole blade cleaves infantry at reach; cannot thrust as well as spears.

name: Naginata
short_description: Japanese glaive balanced for sweeping cuts and nimble footwork; inferior against heavy shields.

name: Guandao
short_description: Chinese broad-bladed polearm excels at momentum-driven chops; cumbersome for smaller users.

name: Partisan
short_description: Broad-bladed spear mixes thrust and cut; side lugs snag on armor but hinder withdrawal.

name: Spetum
short_description: Forked spear good at trapping weapons; prongs reduce penetrating depth.

name: Pike
short_description: Very long spear forms infantry hedge against cavalry; useless once line is broken.

name: Lance
short_description: Mounted spear designed for charge impact; heavy and unwieldy on foot.

name: Spear
short_description: Pole thrusting weapon requires little training and works in formation; shorter than pikes so less reach.

name: Trident
short_description: Three-prong spear excels at fishing foes out of water and disarming nets; prongs reduce armor penetration.

name: Bident
short_description: Two-prong fork used to pin shields and creatures; limited lethal thrusting depth.

name: Quarterstaff
short_description: Six-foot hardwood staff provides reach, defense, and non-lethal options; struggles against plate and blades.

name: Bo Staff
short_description: Asia-style flexible grip staff enables rapid spins and sweeps; lacks mass to break armor.

name: Greatclub
short_description: Massive wooden cudgel crushes bones through mail; crude shape easily parried by skilled swords.

name: Kanabo
short_description: Spiked ogre club shatters armor and morale; extremely heavy for ordinary mortals.

name: Tetsubo
short_description: Iron-shod staff smashes through gates and shields; slow swing speed.

name: Mace
short_description: Flanged head focuses force to dent armor; short reach versus polearms.

name: Morning Star
short_description: Spiked mace inflicts puncture and blunt trauma; heavy head unbalances quick parries.

name: Flail
short_description: Chain-linked ball bypasses shields and generates whip power; hard to control and risks self-injury.

name: Warhammer
short_description: Hammer-and-pick combo punches plate and hooks riders; tiny striking face easy to miss.

name: Maul
short_description: Two-handed sledge cracks bones and doors; slow and telegraphed.

name: Sling
short_description: Simple leather pouch hurls stones silently over distance; requires skill and has low armor penetration.

name: Staff Sling
short_description: Pole-mounted sling throws heavier shot for siege skirmish; reload time slower than bows.

name: Shortbow
short_description: Compact bow fires quickly from cover; limited range compared to longbows.

name: Longbow
short_description: Tall bow delivers high-powered arrows that pierce mail at range; demands great strength and space.

name: Composite Bow
short_description: Horn-and-sinew recurve bow with high power in small size ideal for cavalry; moisture warps limbs.

name: Recurve Bow
short_description: Curved limb bow stores extra energy for fast shots; harder to string and maintain.

name: Greatbow
short_description: Massive war bow outranges even longbows; impractical on horseback or in forests.

name: Crossbow
short_description: Prod-armed stock weapon easy for novices and packs punch; slow reload exposes shooter.

name: Hand Crossbow
short_description: One-hand crossbow suitable for stealth shots and dual wield; scant power and range.

name: Heavy Crossbow
short_description: Windlass-draw crossbow that pierces plate; reload times measured in rounds.

name: Repeating Crossbow
short_description: Magazine-fed bow fires bolts in quick succession; each shot weaker than standard crossbows.

name: Blowgun
short_description: Silent tube weapon delivers poisoned darts unnoticed; ineffective against any armor.

name: Atlatl
short_description: Spear-thrower increases javelin velocity for hunting large beasts; cumbersome in melee.

name: Javelin
short_description: Light throwing spear useful for skirmish harass; lacks mass for shield wall.

name: Throwing Axe
short_description: Balanced axe hurled to disrupt shields; once thrown, wielder is unarmed.

name: Throwing Knife
short_description: Balanced blade for silent ranged takedowns; poor penetration and easily deflected.

name: Chakram
short_description: Indian throwing ring flies far and slices on return; bounce unpredictably in forests.

name: Shuriken
short_description: Small steel star distracts and poisons more than kills; negligible damage by itself.

name: Boomerang
short_description: Curved throwing stick returns if it misses; limited lethality but great for signaling.

name: Dart
short_description: Weighted throwing spike good for precision poison delivery; short effective range.

name: Net
short_description: Weighted mesh entangles foes for follow-up strikes; useless against flyers and large beasts.

name: Trident & Net
short_description: Classic gladiator combo pins targets then finishes them; requires high coordination and space.

name: Whip
short_description: Flexible lash can disarm and trip at reach with crack; deals little damage to armor.

name: Chain Whip
short_description: Segmented metal whip wraps around limbs and parries blades; risks hitting user if mis-timed.

name: Urumi
short_description: Flexible sword-whip creates deadly arcs that ignore shields; extremely dangerous to wielder indoors.

name: Kusarigama
short_description: Chain-and-sickle weapon entangles then slashes; hard to master and useless in tight crowds.

name: Meteor Hammer
short_description: Twin weighted chains deliver momentum impacts from afar; predictable once opponent times swings.

name: Nunchaku
short_description: Twin sticks on chain great for rapid strikes and blocking; short reach limits battlefield use.

name: Sai
short_description: Pronged baton disarms swords and stabs with tip; minimal cutting edge.

name: Tonfa
short_description: Side-handled baton offers rotating blocks and strikes; ineffective against armor.

name: Cestus
short_description: Metal-stud glove adds punching damage and can bypass parries; no reach and exposes hand.

name: Spiked Gauntlet
short_description: Armor glove with spikes turns grapples lethal; reduces dexterity and tool use.

name: Shield Bash
short_description: Using shield edge to strike surprises foes and controls space; lower damage than weapons.

name: Buckler
short_description: Tiny fist shield parries incoming blows and punches faces; sacrifices coverage for speed.

name: Tower Shield
short_description: Wall-sized shield creates mobile cover; weight slows movement and requires strength.

name: Spiked Shield
short_description: Reinforced shield delivers punishing bashes; heavier and may snag on allies.

name: Sap
short_description: Lead-filled blackjack knocks targets unconscious quietly; ineffective against helmets.

name: Truncheon
short_description: Short hardwood baton favored by guards for crowd control; little stopping power on beasts.

name: Flintlock Pistol
short_description: Early firearm with great stopping shock and loud report; single shot then lengthy reload.

name: Musket
short_description: Smoothbore long gun delivers armor-ignoring bullet at 150 yards; poor accuracy without volley.

name: Blunderbuss
short_description: Trumpet-mouthed gun fires spread of shot ideal for close defense; short range only.

name: Hand Cannon
short_description: Primitive black-powder tube hitting like a small cannon; recoil dangerous and ignition slow.

name: Arquebus
short_description: Matchlock long gun that revolutionizes sieges; requires rest hook and is useless in rain.

name: Siege Crossbow (Arbalest)
short_description: Giant crossbow wins bunker duels with steel bolts; immobilizes crew during crank.

name: Ballista
short_description: Torsion siege engine hurls gigantic darts through walls; stationary and needs crew.

name: Catapult
short_description: Tension or torsion arm flings stones over battlements; inaccurate and slow to reload.

name: Trebuchet
short_description: Counterweight sling throws 90-kg rocks to pulverize castles; massive setup time.

name: Battering Ram
short_description: Log reinforced with iron cap breaks gates; requires cover and teamwork against arrows.

name: Siege Tower
short_description: Wheeled wooden tower lets troops scale walls safely; vulnerable to fire and moats.

name: Boiling Oil (Cauldron)
short_description: Defensive cauldron pours scalding liquid on climbers; limited ammo and dangerous to prepare.

name: Alchemist's Fire
short_description: Sticky flask that ignites on impact spreading chaos; difficult to extinguish and risky to carry.

name: Smoke Bomb
short_description: Glass orb releases thick obscuring cloud for stealth retreats; useless in strong wind.

name: Flash Powder
short_description: Bright alchemical burst blinds nearby eyes; nonlethal and requires dry storage.

name: Poison Needle Ring
short_description: Concealed ring prick swiftly delivers toxin in handshake; tiny reservoir and single use.

name: Blowpipe Dart Frog
short_description: South-jungle reed pipe fires venom darts silently; wind affects aim and reload is slow.

name: War Scythe
short_description: Converted farm scythe with blade upright for sweeping slashes; heavy and unbalanced.

name: Sickle
short_description: Curved hand blade hooks tendons at close range; short reach limits dueling value.

name: Guisarme
short_description: Medieval pole hook pulls riders from saddles; cutting edge smaller than halberd.

name: Billhook
short_description: Agrarian polearm with hook and spike clears pike blocks; mediocre thrust.

name: Mancatcher
short_description: Pole with spring prongs captures targets alive; ineffective for lethal combat.

name: Whaling Harpoon
short_description: Barbed giant spear launched from deck to tether sea monsters; rope tugs wielder if beast dives.

name: Plasma Glaive
short_description: Magitech polearm wreathed in plasma arcs, melts through steel quickly; power cell drains fast and illuminates wielder.

name: Crystal Wand
short_description: Focus rod channels spells with precision; fragile if struck and useless without mana.

name: Runic Staff
short_description: Long staff engraved with runes enhances spell range and serves as walking aid; mundanely a simple stick if rune circuit is broken.

name: Arcane Orb
short_description: Floating globe fires bolts of energy hands-free; shatters if overloaded by disruption magic.

name: Sunblade
short_description: Holy sword of pure light burns undead and cuts like a longsword; emits glow that ruins stealth.

name: Frostbrand
short_description: Enchanted sword that extinguishes flame and deals cold damage; half as effective in deserts.

name: Thunder Hammer
short_description: Dwarven maul releases thunderclap on impact stunning foes; deafens allies in tunnels.

name: Storm Bow
short_description: Elven bow that shoots arrows turned to lightning midflight; useless in anti-magic fields.

name: Blood Spear
short_description: Accursed spear that heals wielder on kills; corrupts user with each feed.

name: Living Whip
short_description: Vine-like whip that can grapple independently and regrow; vulnerable to fire and cold.

name: Clockwork Blade
short_description: Gear-driven segmented sword can extend into whip sword for surprise; mechanism jams in sand.

name: Steam Rifle
short_description: Boiler-powered rifle fires metal slugs silently via pressure; needs water and time to build steam.

name: Etheric Pistol
short_description: Crystal capacitor gun shoots ghost-phase bullets ignoring walls; cannot harm constructs or golems.

name: Dragonlance
short_description: Silver inlaid lance pierces dragon scales with resonance magic; heavy and unwieldy against man-sized foes.

name: Chaos Dagger
short_description: Shift-shaped blade unpredictably changes length and edge; risk of wounding wielder on critical miss.

name: Graviton Hammer
short_description: Runed hammer creates micro-gravity well on strike pinning enemies; cooldown long between blows.

name: Phantom Chakram
short_description: Ethereal disc passes through nonliving matter and returns; cannot damage constructs or walls.

name: Shadow Rapier
short_description: Blade of condensed darkness bypasses armor to strike life force; dissipates in bright sunlight.

name: Phoenix Talon
short_description: Curved dagger ignites in flame when drawn, cauterizing wounds; temperamental and burns scabbard.

name: Sonic Spear
short_description: Tip vibrates at high frequency cutting through stone quietly; vibration reveals wielder to bats.

name: Golem Fist
short_description: Titanic stone gauntlet worn like a weaponized glove delivering seismic punches; cumbersome and slows spellcasting gestures.

name: Runebound Chain
short_description: Chain infused with binding glyphs that tighten on command; ineffective against incorporeal targets.

name: Soul Reaver Scythe
short_description: Dark scythe harvests souls restoring wielder’s vigor; offers no parrying ability and scares allies.

name: Celestial Mace
short_description: Star-metal mace glows and smites fiends with radiant bursts; heavy cost and brittle against adamantine.

name: Voidstar Flail
short_description: Morning star containing miniature black hole that drags targets; unpredictable trajectory near magnetics.

name: Mirror Shield
short_description: Polished shield reflects spells back at caster; less durable against brute force weapons.

name: Spectral Net
short_description: Ghost-silk net tangles ethereal creatures; passes harmlessly through mundane foes.

name: Grappling Gun
short_description: Steam-powered hook launcher grants vertical mobility; limited offensive use and bulky.

name: Exploding Kunai
short_description: Thrown knife with timed fuse for area damage; risky if timer fails.

name: Frost Grenade
short_description: Alchemical sphere that bursts into freezing shards immobilizing groups; collateral damage to allies.

name: Lightning Rod
short_description: Metal pole that channels storm bolts into enemies; useless without weather or magic source.

name: Iron Fan
short_description: War fan deflects darts and can slash arteries unseen; limited against plate armor.

name: Whisper Bow
short_description: Silent recurve enchanted to mute arrow flight for assassins; lower draw strength than war bows.

name: Gladiator Net
short_description: Weighted net for arena captures, reinforced to resist blades; ineffective against beasts bigger than ogres.

name: Bloodletter Saw
short_description: Jagged serrated sword causes bleeding overtime; cuts get stuck on bone slowing follow-ups.

name: Spore Bomb
short_description: Glass jar of fungal spores blinds and infects lungs; wind unpredictability can backfire.

name: Sun Hammer
short_description: Mithril warhammer stores sunlight, releasing blinding flash; needs daylight recharge and dim underground.

name: Drill Spear
short_description: Clockwork spear tip spins to bore into tough carapace; gears clog in mud.

name: Serpent Blade
short_description: Segmented sword can extend like whip for extra reach; joints weaker to parries.

name: Jet Pike
short_description: Rune pike with rear propulsion burst for lunging charges; limited charges and hard to stop.

name: Echo Boomerang
short_description: Enchanted returning boomerang that tracks noise; ineffective in silence spells.

name: Hook Sword
short_description: Chinese sword with hook guard to trip and link weapons; hook reduces thrust strength.

name: Bladed Tonfa
short_description: Tonfa with forearm blade blocks and slices in same motion; risk of self-cut on quick rotations.

name: Energy Glaive
short_description: Crystalline polearm projects laser edge able to sever steel; energy lines reveal user’s position.

name: Adamantine Knuckle
short_description: Indestructible brass knuckle breaks stone with punches; zero reach and taxing on joints.

name: Storm Trident
short_description: Sea-god weapon that summons lightning on impact; conductivity threatens wielder in water.

name: Moon Sickle
short_description: Feyblade that glows and heals allies’ wounds while cutting foes; glow spoils ambush and iron dulls it.

name: Sandskimmer Blade
short_description: Curved sword enchanted to ignore sand drag letting desert warriors glide blows; worthless on stone.

name: Cobalt Repeater
short_description: Gnomish crank rifle auto-fires darts rapidly; jams often and low stopping power.

name: Starforged Lance
short_description: Meteor-iron lance pierces magical shields of sky beasts; heavy magnetic pull interferes with compasses.
